name: Ziva David
description:
Who is the most famous Israeli in America?

Is it Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu?

Is it NBA player Omri Casspi?

Is it supermodel Bar Refaeli?

No, this Israeli doesn't sign international treaties, or play professional basketball, or shtup Leonardo DiCaprio. She is the star of the most popular show on American television. She is Ziva David, Mossad agent.

Alright, she is a fictional character. Alright, she is not played by an Israeli (and not even by a Jew!), Cote de Pablo. Alright, she's been killed off on her show. Alright, for all its popularity, we've never seen an episode of NCIS.

How could we forget? Natalie Portman was born in Israel!

Who is the second most famous Israeli in America?
